issue.title: [JS] RecordBatchReader throughNode should respect autoDestroy
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4652](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4652). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The Reader transform stream closes after reading one set of tables even when autoDestroy is false. Instead it should reset/reopen the reader, like `RecordBatchReader.readAll()` does.
